body:
Dear Theodoros, thank you for the updating!



I posted a new problem I encountered [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/butterfly-test-simulation-for-case-with-fvscheme-updated-is-not) when step 1.2 in the outdoor airflow demo file is not bypassed. Hope the team can kindly advise.



Thank you all!

- Ji
